entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
